WorkItem.ClosedComment: Cannot fix because of the framework
WorkItem.Description: The output of a query should be a ReadOnlyObservableCollection and not a ReadOnlyContinuousCollection.  Clinq should be using the built-in .NET classes as much as possible.

Comments.Message: That would be excellent, but, unfortunately, ReadOnlyObservableCollection can't be used for a variety of technical reasons.  I would love to not use ReadOnlyContinuousCollection, but unless they change the framework we won't be able to satisfy this request.
